This photo is an oldie but a goodie. Obviously the baby is out and we are unfortunately less one Shepherd but if there was one picture to sum up my little family; it‚Äôs this one. We hope you have a magical and peaceful day of reflection for all that you are thankful for with people you care about. Gratitude for all things in life makes life so full and our world so much better.
With immense gratitude and appreciation,
Ian and Clan
P.S. Yes, that is our bunny In my wife‚Äôs left hand. His name is Bourbon. Because of his color not because he‚Äôs a drunk.

Yo @paulwesley - remember these little babies? Our 1st samples of OUR BELOVED BOURBON so long ago. I‚Äôm sitting here with Moke after an extremely long day reading, sipping our juice and giving tremendous thanks for all of our incredible opportunities together over the last 10 years. This one is a hit out of the park my brother and to all of you (of drinking age of course!) around the WORLD, we can‚Äôt wait to share this with you to create some new memories with the Salvatore Bros. Not on your screen but in your glass.
Happy ThanksGiving everyone. Have a blessed day with family and friends. Next year at this time we will be toasting you all with this golden liquid that we‚Äôve put so much of our spirit. The spirit of the brothers... ü•É

Link in bio! Let's do this!!! I‚Äôm so excited to be celebrating Giving Tuesday and the Ian Somerhalder Foundation‚Äôs 9th birthday with YOU. My Facebook Fundraiser will be going on from November 26th to December 9th on my Facebook page! Most importantly, Facebook will be matching donations - that‚Äôs doubling your giving - on Giving Tuesday, December 3rd at exactly 8am EST/5am PST/1 pm GMT. Matching funds will run out quickly so make sure to meet me there and be the first to donate! #ISF #GivingTuesday #HappyBirthdayISF

Great to meet you and obrigado! üáßüá∑üáßüá∑üáßüá∑üáßüá∑üáßüá∑üáßüá∑üáßüá∑üáßüá∑üáßüá∑üáßüá∑üáßüá∑üáßüá∑ It‚Äôs been amazing here. Speaking on panels with some of the greatest minds in business and influence talking not just about sustainability but regenerative business and farming practices. These business practices will slow climate change while feeding people, bringing them the products that they need, employing huge swaths of the population and generating capital that will be used To make great change. That‚Äôs the ethos of my companies. It‚Äôs been incredible meeting amazing investors before the launch of my nutraceutical functional drink company @imrituals You‚Äôre going to love this. @grazielagems , you have outdone yourself again. Thank you thank you THANK YOU for continuously supporting ISF, believing in us and the foundation, designing around what fuels YOUR passion,  supporting our programs and services and furthering ISF‚Äôs mission to positively impact the planet and it‚Äôs creatures. For all of you who have already purchased Graziela‚Äôs ISF collection, thank you! These new designs are the latest addition which she has created along with my wife to benefit our mission to empower, educate and leave this planet a better place for our children. 60% of the retail purchase price of all of the items in the Graziela for ISF collection will be donated to ISF in support of our charitable mission. Graziela, thank you from the bottom of my heart. Thank you! Spend some time looking through the entire collection at https://grazielagems.com/graziela-for-isf/ ! üì∏ by @nikkireed
One word: HELLO! Two words: TEXT ME! Three words: HERE‚ÄôS MY NUMBER! Four words: THIS IS VERY COOL!

#whatmakesaman ? I‚Äôm PROUD to be part of this campaign with the one and only @zegnaofficial . #whatmakesaman ? It‚Äôs a very important question for men and boys to ask themselves and to ultimately act on those inner findings. It‚Äôs also a very important one for women and girls to ask of men and boys and hold them accountable.
Integrity. Accountability. Compassion. Are just a few words that makes a good man. Gentlemen, it‚Äôs time for us ALL to rise to occasion and be stronger than our excuses. To lead by example and find compassion, strength, energy and happiness in our lives and in ourselves. It is imperative that we do this as sons, as fathers, as partners and as men. Our world is a direct reflection of how men have been conducting themselves for thousands of years and it‚Äôs time for a massive global paradigm shift. Let‚Äôs be better. Every day. I‚Äôm with you. Thank you @zegnaofficial for bringing such a powerful message into the world to inspire not just conversation but action. Thank you thank you thank you. I look forward to hearing your thoughts below.
With immense gratitude and appreciation,
Ian

Unfiltered early morning rides with this guy as the sun rises over the Pacific Ocean. Then some hay for breakfast. The level of beauty and love in these creatures is so vast it‚Äôs out of this world. Even with the immense pressure and stress of building these companies and finishing #VWars this 1200 lb baby boy reminds me to take a breath for me. It‚Äôs hard to do things for ourselves. But we need it. We need our own little rituals for our soul and body to be the best versions of ourselves. Time with a horse is never a waste, even when time is scarce...
Unfiltered Saturday morning love series... Bench pressing plus 150lbs

Doing some of my favorite things: drinking/savoring my OWN bourbon, editing photos and working with the team from a @wheelsup8760 King Air 350i on my way to China. Yup, meaning OUR own bourbon... Can you imagine if the Salvatore brothers had their OWN bourbon? Well, it‚Äôs coming! @paulwesley and I have been working our asses off with our incredible team to make this happen. WITH passion, hard work and an uncompromising quest/thirst for quality, we have arrived! We want to share with you something very special and dear to us. You‚Äôve given us so many wonderful years as these characters and we want to bring you something to enjoy that brings back some great memories and some good times to come!
It‚Äôs going to be fun. We‚Äôre going to be traveling the WOLRD meeting so many of you and launching this with some very fun parties I must say!

How many of you want a taste!? What do you look for in a bourbon?

What does your guy or gal look for in a bourbon?
Let me know in the comments- I can‚Äôt wait to read them!

I‚Äôm working tirelessly to create and build great companies with products that mean something to you and the world. To generate revenue through business and in turn use those resources for good. Part of our company mission and ethos is to invest profits into helping our world through regenerative agriculture and farming practices. It‚Äôs the surest and quickest way to slow climate change by sequestering carbon and producing oxygen. This in turn protects and regenerates our precious water sources paving a way to a healthy future. This is about helping our communities, our farms and our farmers that work so hard to feed us all giving us life. It‚Äôs the best way to preserve life for us all and future the generations. I‚Äôm proud of the work we‚Äôre doing and I can‚Äôt wait to hear from you.
I‚Äôm not there yet, I‚Äôm still going to need help with @isfofficial but I‚Äôm confident that this will be so successful that I can stop asking you for help and put some substantial projects together for a brighter and healthier present and future! We can‚Äôt wait to share this experience with you! Let‚Äôs do this! Who‚Äôs in??? Cheers! ü•É
Love,
Damon and Stefan

Last night, dressed in this exquisite suit custom made and sustainably produced by the genius that is Tommy Hilfiger @tommyhilfiger I was asked to present the sustainability award to @zegnaofficial and @maxmara for their efforts and investment in the future of fashion with this beautiful woman. What an amazing place to be, celebrating sustainability in fashion the change-making brands and designers who are doubling down on sustainable business practices as pioneers paving the way. To give us, the consumers a way to participate in healing our world and express ourselves through fashion. I got to wear this beautiful
HILFIGER COLLECTION shawl collar tuxedo and shirt designed with denim fabrics containing 35% recycled materials, including pre-consumer and post-consumer recycled cotton and recycled water bottles. Mr Hilfiger and team, how amazing it is to see such a huge and powerful brand taking real action toward building a sustainable future. In one of the more destructive industries in the world, you are taking charge with your bold approach. It was truly an honor collaborating with you, and I look forward to what is next...

Hey everyone. Please check this out and share this. It‚Äôs very important to ME and to our planet. As you all know, I am passionate about protecting our oceans. Plastic pollution is not going away and it's important to take action towards cleaning up our beaches and coasts! I am beyond excited to announce that I‚Äôm partnering with @AmericanExpress to combat this issue RIGHT NOW! Okay- stay with me. Here‚Äôs how you can get involved. Head to the @AmericanExpress or @parley.tv Instagram page to help #BackOurOceans In the comments of the #BackOurOceans posts explain why you #BackOurOceans or tag friends who you want to get involved. For every comment made from now through 9/23, @AmericanExpress will partner with @parley.tv to remove 2 lbs of plastic from beaches and coasts, up to 1 million lbs. Come on let‚Äôs do this together! Share! Tag! Change! I am so humbled and grateful for your commitment and action. #AmexAmbassador
